headline: Growing Retirement Fears Put MetLife’s Guaranteed Income Strategy In Focus
summary: MetLife (NYSE:MET) has released its 2026 Paycheck or Pot of Gold Study on retirement security. The research highlights growing anxiety among pre-retirees and retirees about outliving their savings. Survey findings point to rising concern over healthcare costs and longer life expectancy. Respondents report stronger interest in guaranteed lifetime income options for retirement. For investors watching MetLife at a share price of $78.89, this new study provides a closer look at how retirement...
